name: Catwalk (HastyGames)
description:
All the art in this game is made by me using the program "pyxeledit" I hope you like it.

(I suggest playing this game in fullscreen for the best experience)

~Controls~

Movement = Arrow Keys

Pause = P

Menu Selection = Mouse

~Controls~

~Music~

www.soundimage.org
